column1: Smoque BBQ////If only Yelp had half stars...I'd probably go 3.5. A couple years ago
column2: this was a hands down 5 for me. And clearly about everyone in Chicago too. Upon revisiting this weekend and the expansion of other BBQ places in the Chicago burbs
column3: I'm not as in love anymore. That said it's a solid BBQ joint and packed from open to close it seems so perhaps I'm the only one that feels this way.
